name: Power Run (hovinarri)
description:
This is a game written for the LDJAM July 2017

I used AGK and their graphics to write the game...

the red ellipse in the foreground is YOU, the player...

i'd like to say it is the avatar of your soul but actually, I can't draw!!!

remember to click on the game in the browser to make sure it's an active window!!!

(some weird HTML stuff is appearing... I didn't add it!!!)
